sentences.english: How can you farm if the profits will be theirs?
sentences.chinese: 如果收益都是他們的，你怎麼會去種田？

sentences.english: At that time making it to a mess and confused farmer can not farm.
sentences.chinese: 那時節令很亂，弄得莊稼人無法種田。

sentences.english: The income from farming is not enough to properly raise a child.
sentences.chinese: 種田的收入不夠好好撫養孩子的。

sentences.english: Don't you see the farm-house yonder?
sentences.chinese: 你看到那種田人的房子嗎？

sentences.english: Apart from cooking, mother did farming, planted vegetables, fed pigs, raised silkworms and spun cotton into yarn.
sentences.chinese: 母親把飯煮了，還要種田種菜，餵豬養蠶，紡棉花。

sentences.english: There is no harvest to reap, letting opportunity pass us by.
sentences.chinese: 正如種田而沒有播種，皆是空過人緣。

sentences.english: Take farmers as an example. They are now more fond of scientific farming.
sentences.chinese: 以農民爲例，他們現在更樂於使用科學種田法。

sentences.english: Scientific farming is the key to the further development of agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 科學種田是進一步發展農業的關鍵。

sentences.english: The experts are busy with scientific farming.
sentences.chinese: 專家們正忙於科學種田。

sentences.english: Chaoshan farmers to intensive famous, such as embroidery farming to speak of.
sentences.chinese: 潮汕農民以精耕細作聞名，有種田如繡花之說。

sentences.english: The scientist is showing the method of scientific farming to the peasants.
sentences.chinese: 那位科學家正在向農民示範科學種田的方法。

sentences.english: Owing to scientific farming skills steady annual increase of crop has been obtained.
sentences.chinese: 由於採用科學種田糧食產量逐年增長。

sentences.english: You must farm scientifically if you want to have a good yield.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想得到好收成，就得用科學方法種田。

definition: to leave one's native place, esp. against one's will (idiom)
to seek one's livelihood/to work to support oneself/to earn a living
to worry/to fret/to be anxious/to become sad
to support a family/to raise a family
to take care of/to raise money/to attend to (guests, customers etc)
to have nothing to do/to idle one's time away (idiom)
